ygData.subject: Re: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... How long have all of you spent in Sol A?  I also have a theory that invis isn t really invis but a drastic reduction in the aggro radius.  If bad faction
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 10 Feb 2000 jhenders@... wrote:
>
> I had the exact thing happen at L35 with my bard. 4 of us in Sol A.
> Everyone invis's up and heads in. Every time, a goblin agro'd on me. I
> tried twice walking behind everyone else and it always happened.
> Everyone else would pass the goblin that attacked me.

How long have all of you spent in Sol A? I also have a theory
that invis isn't really invis but a drastic reduction in the
aggro radius. If bad faction causes an increase in aggro
radius, then stuff that won't attack other invis people will
attack you while you're invis.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
